Syllabus

DS 362 Data-Driven Knowledge Discovery

Instructor Information

  • Instructor: Dr. Jason M. Graham

  • Office: LSC 319A

    • Office Hours: TBD You may also make an appointment to meet with us outside of scheduled office hours. Appointments are not necessary for regularly scheduled office hours.

Course Materials

Required Readings

  • An Introduction to Statistical Learning 2nd Ed. by James, Witten, Hastie, and Tibshirani, freely available online here.

  • Statistical Learning with Math and R by Joe Suzuki, available online through the Weinberg Library here.

  • Tidy Modeling with R by Max Kuhn & Julia Silge, freely available online here.

Recommended Readings

  • Telling Stories with Data by Rohan Alexander, freely available online here.

  • Data Science: A First Introduction by Tiffany Timbers, Trevor Campbell, and Melissa Lee, freely available online here.

  • Tree-Based Methods for Statistical Learning by Brandon M. Greenwell, freely available online here.

  • Statistical Learning from a Regression Perspective by Richard A. Berk, available online through the Weinberg Library here.

Further Reading

  • Elements of Statistical Learning 2nd Ed. by Hastie, Tibshirani, and Friedman, freely available online here.

R References

  • Hands-On Programming with R by Garrett Grolemund, freely available online here.

  • R for Data Science by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund, freely available online here.

  • Data Visualization A Practical Introduction by Healy, freely available online here.
